thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Leslie Merker
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Leslie Merker

author: Leslie Merker
title: Leslie Merker
text: I have been very pleased with my interactions with this company. They provide outstanding customer service, including shipping out their product in a timely manner; and their bacon is head and shoulders above all others. The steak-cut peppered bacon is the best in my opinion. The only negative thing about them is that the product is pricey.
